 My fic is Here. |  main blog @tdcatsblog | Beta reader

title: Chapter 207: Notes and observations
body:
In Which Bakugou has Character Development!

But first…Aizawa no…

1-B just felt like it had more to prove. Aizawa is Best Teacher with a number of Problem Children.

Monoma really is a copycat…

I like the way Kirishima and Kaminari are facing forward in the Vlad frame and had to turn around for the Monoma frame.

All Might likes all his students the same…

…except he really doesn’t.

Bakugou learned from DvK2!

Team 4 deserves the win for this alone, although one could argue that by learning what it means to save, he has already won. (I don’t think Bakugou would consider that winning.) Also, the bakujirou shippers must be screaming.

summary:
Kaminari: You’re single
Shinsou: Yes
Kaminari: And I’m single
Shinsou: Uh-huh
Kaminari: You know what that means?
Shinsou: That...
body:
Kaminari: You’re single

Shinsou: Yes

Kaminari: And I’m single

Shinsou: Uh-huh

Kaminari: You know what that means?

Shinsou: That you’re terrible at romance, and I just don’t have the time.

reblog.comment:
